skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
St Michael Academy San Diego (SMA) is taking steps to be a leader in Catholic Education for The Next Generation student and family. Our content and stories shared through this channel are designed to inspire the next wave of globally conscious Catholic faith based leaders. Their foundation is anchored in the their love and desire to grow closer to God the purpose is a common thread share by all SMA Alumni.

Listen closely to these amazing stories and features showcasing the new heights our youth can do to empower by being positive and action oriented. For further infomation visit our website at www.smasandiego.org
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
